data.title: Longyu
data.meta_description: China's Empress Longyu agreed to sign the abdication on behalf of the six-year-old Emperor on the condition they could keep their titles and receive 4,000,000 silver yuan annually. The Qing dynasty ended and she died only a few months later.
data.text:
China's Empress Longyu agreed to sign the abdication on behalf of the six-year-old Emperor on the condition they could keep their titles and receive 4,000,000 silver yuan annually. The Qing dynasty ended and she died only a few months later.
